パッケージ
org.sat4j.tools の使用

org.sat4j.tools を使用しているパッケージ
org.sat4j Contains a command line launcher for the SAT solvers. 
org.sat4j.opt Built-in optimization framework. 
org.sat4j.tools Tools to be used on top of an ISolver. 
org.sat4j.tools.xplain Implementation of an explanation engine in case of unsatisfiability. 
 

org.sat4j により使用される org.sat4j.tools のクラス
SolutionFoundListener
          Allows the end user to react when a new solution is found.
 

org.sat4j.opt により使用される org.sat4j.tools のクラス
SolverDecorator
          The aim of that class is to allow adding dynamic responsibilities to SAT solvers using the Decorator design pattern.
 

org.sat4j.tools により使用される org.sat4j.tools のクラス
AbstractClauseSelectorSolver
           
AbstractMinimalModel
           
AbstractOutputSolver
           
DimacsArrayReader
          Very simple Dimacs array reader.
IVisualizationTool
           
ModelIterator
          That class allows to iterate through all the models (implicants) of a formula.
OutcomeListener
          Simple interface to check the outcome of running a solver in parallel.
SearchListenerAdapter
           
SolutionFoundListener
          Allows the end user to react when a new solution is found.
SolverDecorator
          The aim of that class is to allow adding dynamic responsibilities to SAT solvers using the Decorator design pattern.
 

org.sat4j.tools.xplain により使用される org.sat4j.tools のクラス
AbstractClauseSelectorSolver
           
FullClauseSelectorSolver
           
GroupClauseSelectorSolver
           
SolverDecorator
          The aim of that class is to allow adding dynamic responsibilities to SAT solvers using the Decorator design pattern.
